titleInfo.title: Letter No. 47 to William Hornby, President and Governor Council at Bombay, from John Beaumont at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter discusses numerous administrative and financial issues related to Bushire including the cost and construction of company buildings. The letter reports news that Zolfikar Cahn has been killed and his head sent to Schyras [Shiraz] and that the Chaub [the Banu Ka'b tribal confederacy] promised Soliman Aga (the Ottoman governor or mutasallimof Basra) to not disrupt trade. Shipped by the Fort William.
